subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Chris Froome, left to fend for himself at the front of the stage, vigilantly marked his opponents’ attacks to stay in the yellow jersey at the Tour de France.
snippet: Chris Froome, left to fend for himself at the front of the stage, vigilantly marked his opponents’ attacks to stay in the yellow jersey at the Tour de France.
